title: Group Therapy: Should she delete old photos of her ex?
description: A listener tells us that her husband recently found pictures on her Facebook that her ex husband is in and he was upset about it. She kept them because they are a part of her past and swears it has nothing to do with her ex being in them.  Should she have to delete them or is it okay to keep them up even though her ex husband is in them?
